schemaUrl.description: The URL of the schema this document conforms to.

archiveId.description: The archive ID of the article.

copilotId.description: The copilot ID of the article.

issueDate.description: The cover date of the issue this article is in.

pageStart.description: The page on which the article starts.

pageEnd.description: The page on which the article ends.

isAdvertisement.description: Designates whether or not this article is an assignment. Must be `false` for editorial content.

pages.description: A collection describing the text frames and images found on the article pages.

raw.description: A collection describing the text frames and images found on the article pages.

jsonld.description: A schmea.org representation of the article.

objectId.description: A MongoDB `ObjectId` identifier. See: https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/method/ObjectId/ for more information.

id.description: The id of the page item. Should be an archive ID for images, and a UUID for text blocks.

boundingBox.description: The bouding box coordinates of the page item.

fileName.description: The original filename of the page.

textBlocks.description: The text blocks on the page.

pageStart.description: The page on which the article starts.

pageEnd.description: The page on which the article ends.

headline.description: The main headline of the article. Also referred to as the `hed` or `printHed`.

articleSection.description: The section or sections (rubrics) the article falls under.

alternativeHeadline.description: The secondary headline of the article. Also referred to as the `dek` or `printDek`.

articleBody.description: The main content of the article, in markup.

anyOf.description: A referenced article (for root articles only).

Supplemental text, often at the start or end of the article, perhaps following a signer. This may be an italicized note, such as a translation credit or additional context like “This is the first part of a two-part Profile.” In the “Goings on About Town” section, this would correspond to italicized details about schedules and locations following an event’s description.

itemReviewed.description: Things reviewed in the article, if applicable.

url.description: The URL of the article on newyorker.com.

isPartOf.description: The issue this article appears in.

name.description: The name of the issue, as printed on the cover, near the page numbers or on the table of contents.

datePublished.description: The publish date of the issue.

url.description: The URL of the issue on newyorker.com.

description.description: A description of the image (to be used as altText).

caption.description: The caption that appeared with the image.
